title: Manager in Indian corporate scene
selftext: One of my friend's colleague took screenshots of his manager who posted pics of his dog and one of female team member, comparing the hair style on company's official teams chat group. One of the other teammate deliberately asked him what he meant to point out his stupidity and deleted when he realised what he did.
comments: How do they think it’s ok to do this. Thu
That's sufficient for a POSH case.
Are you sure you know what POSH means.. It's harassment nevertheless..
